git.jluvisi.minigames  

  • Uses of GameInstance in git.jluvisi

    Methods in git.jluvisi that return types with arguments of type GameInstance
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ArrayList<GameInstance> MicroGames.getGameInstanceCopy()
    Returns a deep copy of the gameList.
    ArrayList<GameInstance> MicroGames.getGameInstances()
    Retrieve the GameInstance's that are currently being held by the plugin.

  • Uses of GameInstance in git.jluvisi.minigames

    Methods in git.jluvisi.minigames that return GameInstance
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static GameInstance GameInstance.getByName​(ArrayList<GameInstance> list, String name)
    Goes through all of the game instances on the server and returns a game instance that has the name specified.
    static GameInstance GameInstance.getPlayerGame​(ArrayList<GameInstance> list, UUID UUID)
    Goes through every game instance on the server and finds the game instance a specific player is in.
    Methods in git.jluvisi.minigames with parameters of type GameInstance
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static GamePlayer GameInstance.getPlayer​(GameInstance instance, UUID uuid)
    Goes through every game instance on the server and finds the GamePlayer specified.
    static void GameInstance.setupSignData​(SignChangeEvent e, GameInstance instance, ConfigManager configYAML)
    Sets up the data for a sign that is placed.
    static void GameInstance.updateSign​(GameInstance instance)
    Updates the join sign to reflect the player amount.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
